snippet.title: Echo Arena And Lone Echo Launch Trailers | E3 2017
snippet.description:
Here's a look at some VR multiplayer sports action from Echo Arena, launching alongside single player Lone Echo, exclusively for Oculus Rift + Touch.

Subscribe to GameSpot Trailers! http://youtube.com/GameSpotTrailers?sub_confirmation=1
